Name: Invader Signal
About the game: Simple at first glance and complex in its mechanics, the game in which you have to fight off asteroids that can fly alone and in groups, each of them has a special color of danger, the space corridor through which dozens of spaceships fly through is also in the way! Invader Signal - In this game, you choose a certain color of your charge to destroy asteroids flying in your direction, which can change their colors and cluster. You need to be careful when striking, as spaceships are constantly flying in front of you, which cannot be touched! Game Features: - Reaction - Pleasant Decoration - Music - Increasing Difficulty
